text: "Nature Anthem" is a song by American indie rock band Grandaddy, released as a single in 2004 in conjunction with the album Below the Radio. == Music video == Its music video features people out in nature dressed up in animal costumes. == Legacy == The title song was played in a Honda Civic Hybrid television commercial in 2005, and Coca-Cola's summer advertising campaign in 2006. ==Track listing== ==References== == External links == * * Category:2004 singles Category:Grandaddy songs Category:2004 songs
title: Nature Anthem
